Text:
Classification: Mini-Series
Genre: Drama | Educational | Family
Status: New Series
Network: PBS ( USA)

"AMERICA REVEALED", a new four-part mini-series airing Wednesdays on PBS at 10/9c, takes viewers on a journey high above the American landscape to reveal the country as never seen before.

Complex systems expert Yul Kwon (winner of â€œSurvivor: Cook Islandsâ€?), hosts this exciting new PBS series that travels through time, space and systems to reveal a nation of interdependent and intricately interwoven networks that feed and power the nation, produce millions of goods, transport people great distances and still come together to make America work. (Source: PBS)
